entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 6:07 PM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 18.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 28 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 6:07 PM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 14 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the evening. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature rising to minus 14 by morning. Wind chill minus 30 in the evening and minus 25 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 6:07 PM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023
